channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia says suspect detained in killing of top general in Moscow blast
item.description: Russian officials say a man has been detained over the killing of Lt. General Igor Kirillov, who led Russia's chemical and biological weapons unit.

item.title: Injured Italian caver freed after 75-hour rescue
item.description: It is the second time explorer Ottavia Piana has been rescued from the cave system in Bergamo.

item.title: What we learned from Elian Gonzalez, 25 years later
item.description: Twenty-five years ago, a boy named Elian Gonzalez appeared — remarkably alive — in the waters off the coast of Miami. Immediately, his fate became the...

item.title: 1 killed, 9 injured in shooting, fiery crash in Baltimore suburb of Towson, police say
item.description: One person was killed and nine others injured in a shooting and fiery crash in the Baltimore suburb of Towson Tuesday night, authorities said.

item.title: Key details about the man accused of killing UnitedHealthcare’s CEO
'Cancer ghosting' can be more painful than treatment, survivors say
item.description: Loss of social support after a cancer diagnosis is a surprisingly common experience, social workers and cancer patients say. For young cancer survivor...

item.title: Missing India woman found in Pakistan returns home after 22 years
item.description: Hamida Banu was promised a job in Dubai, but says the recruitment agent instead took her to Pakistan.

item.title: Congo says mysterious disease killing dozens of kids finally identified
item.description: "The mystery has finally been solved," Congo's health ministry says, after an unidentified disease outbreak started killing mainly women and children ...

item.title: Honda and Nissan hold merger talks
item.description: In March, the two Japanese car makers agreed to explore a strategic partnership for electric vehicles.

item.title: Nigerian man promised pardon after 10 years on death row for stealing hens
item.description: The sentencing sparked an outcry in Nigeria - his family have been campaigning for his release ever since.

item.title: Michael Vick says he will be the new head football coach at Norfolk State University
item.description: Vick, a four-time Pro Bowl player, is returning to his home state of Virginia to coach the team.

item.title: Russia detains Uzbek man over general's killing in Moscow
item.description: A 29-year-old Uzbekistan citizen has been detained over the death of Kirillov and his assistant, state media says.

item.title: Suspect charged with killing UnitedHealthcare’s CEO as an act of terrorism
item.description: Prosecutors disclosed the indictment Tuesday as they worked to bring Luigi Mangione to a New York court from from a Pennsylvania jail.

item.title: Churches are making room for grief and loss at Christmas
item.description: More and more congregations are trying to be sensitive to those who are grieving during the holidays. The move ranges from special services to the inc...

item.title: Trump sues Des Moines Register and Iowa pollster over pre-election poll
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has sued the Des Moines Register over a pre-election poll that had him trailing Vice President Kamala Harris in Iowa. He ...

item.title: Trains, tracks, and tradition: Lionel celebrates 125 years of Christmas fun
item.description: Lionel trains turns 125, celebrating more than a century of holiday magic. From historic models to smartphone-controlled locomotives, these iconic toy...

item.title: Indiana conducts first execution in 15 years, puts quadruple killer to death

item.title: Community members wrestle with grief in aftermath of Wisconsin school shooting
